title: Master Yi vs Irelia

replies.body: Yi's true damage is 30 at max rank plus 20% of his AD and every 4 stacks of Double strike he will hit twice so with 110 AD he'll have 22 bonus to his attacks while Wuju is active (at max rank) so with 1.0 attack speed he'll have attacked 6 times in 5 seconds and Irelia has 75 so she'll have landed 75x5 with Hiten Style active and he'll have landed 55x6 so Irelia with the same attack speed at 110 AD will deal more true Damage than Yi.
